# neiky-ddracebot.js

Exemple:
```js
const DDNet = require('neiky-ddracebot.js');
const { Client } = DDNet;
const config = {
    ip_server: '127.0.0.1',
    port: 8303,
    nickname: 'Bot Username',
};

const client = new Client(`${config.ip_server}`, config.port, config.nickname);

client.on('connection_au_serveur_ddrace', async() => {
    const username = await client.avoirUsernameBot();

    console.log(`Connection au serveur: \n${config.ip_server}:${config.port}\nAvec le compte ${username}`);
});

client.on('message_au_serveur', message => {
    if(message.message == '+skin') {
        let username = message.utilisateur.InformationDuBot.name;
        let skin = message.utilisateur.InformationDuBot.skin;
        return client.game.Say(`${username}: skin: ${skin}`);
    };
});

client.joinDDRaceServer();
